extendedInfo.description: Ringtone Kid is your #1 source for ringtones in the Android Market! Set ANY song as your ringtone or text message tone, for FREE!If you've ever wanted a specific song as a ringtone, but couldn't find it or didn't want to pay for it, then this app is for you. Ringtone Kid works like this:* Pick ANY song you have saved on your phone (you can transfer any song you've bought or downloaded from your computer to your phone).* Edit it into a ringtone (choose where you want your ringtone to start and where you want it to end).* Save it as your ringtone, text message sound, notification sound, or alarm!* That's it!Features:- Select any song or sound file from your phone. Allowed formats include MP3, WAV, AAC, MP4, 3GPP, and AMR. Use any song that you've transfered to your phone, downloaded on your phone, or purchased through the Amazon MP3 store.- Use the Ringtone Editor to select the starting and ending points of the ringtone. For example, if you want your ringtone to start at your favorite part of the song, you can choose that as the start, and if you want it to be about 30 seconds long, you can choose the point 30 seconds later as the end.- Use the touchscreen controls in the Player to play and preview your ringtone. Edit it some more if you need to, until you get it just how you want it.- Save your ringtone and mark it as either Music, Ringtone, Alarm, or Notification (text message sound).- Download additional Ringtones and Wallpapers for your selected artist.- Audio recorder feature allows you to record audio through your phone's microphone and use it or edit it into a ringtone.Ringtone Kid is similar to apps like Ringdroid, MP3 Ringtone Maker Pro, and Make a Ringtone, but it's much faster and the interface is a lot more intuitive. It's free, so download it now and try it out! It allows you to select ANY song you have - so now you can load up your favorite song from Lil Wayne, Drake, Justin Bieber, Selena Gomez, Wiz Khalifa, or any other popular artist, edit it, and save it as your ringtone or text message sound!If you like this app, please leave a rating and review and let us know!
